about_the_game:
A CASUAL REAL-TIME STRATEGY GAME

Summon different kinds of creatures, and cast explosive spells to reign down upon your enemies, Ven'rif is a casual real-time strategy card game where you build your deck and fight against another opponent on a battlefield. In comparison with other real-time strategy games, Ven'rif simplifies the difficulty of a traditional real-time strategy game but keeps the depth of the gameplay on a very short playtime.

OBJECTIVES

- Capture buildings to gain more resources 

- Kill wild camps to gain more experience

- Gain more experience to draw stronger cards, and ultimately use the late game cards to end the game

- Assassinate the opposing avatar to win the game

Features:
- With over 79 cards to build around your deck (5 late game cards)
- Multiplayer (1 versus 1, 2 versus 2)

- Casual control of your army/forces with just a single click of a mouse

content_descriptors.notes:
The game depicts
- Mild violence and death

- Monsters / Creatures fighting

short_description: A real-time strategy card game. Can be played against another player or have a duo. Players build their decks from 4 different tiers and use them across the battlefield. Gain experience to draw stronger cards, capture structures to gain more resources, and finally eliminate the enemy avatar.
